00010 int
00011 MML::createAttribute(const char *name, const DOMString &value,
00012                 Element e, const MMLAttribute **att) {
00013         // find the attribute in the elements attribute list
00014         int pos = -1;
00015         const Attribute *elementAttList = attList[e];
00016         uint max = attListLen[e];
00017         for (uint i=0; pos == -1 && i<max; ++i) {
00018                 if (!strcmp(attributeTag[elementAttList[i]], name)) {
00019                         pos = i;
00020                 }
00021         }
00022         if (pos == -1) {
00023                 return -1; // attribute is not valid for this element
00024                 // ....
00025         }
00026         // create a new attribute at the specified position
00027         Attribute a = elementAttList[pos];
00028         AttributeType type = attTypes[a];
00029         att[pos] = attFunc[type](value, a);
00030         if (!att[pos]) pos = -2; // value is not valid for this attribute
00031         return pos;
00032 }
00033 int
00034 MML::createAttribute(const Attribute a, const DOMString &value,
00035                 Element e, const MMLAttribute **att) {
00036         int pos = -1;
00037         const Attribute *elementAttList = attList[e];
00038         uint max = attListLen[e];
00039         for (uint i=0; pos == -1 && i<max; ++i) {
00040                 if (elementAttList[i] == a) {
00041                         pos = i;
00042                 }
00043         }
00044         if (pos == -1) {
00045                 cerr << "internal error: invalid attribute for element."
00046                         << endl;
00047                 exit(1);
00048         }
00049         AttributeType type = attTypes[a];
00050         att[pos] = attFunc[type](value, a);
00051         return pos;
00052 }
00053 MMLAttribute *
00054 MML::createAttribute(const Attribute a, const DOMString &value) {
00055         AttributeType type = attTypes[a];
00056         MMLAttribute *att = attFunc[type](value, a);
00057         att->cleanup = false;
00058         return att;
00059 }
00060 MMLAttribute *
00061 MML::createBOOL(const DOMString &v, Attribute) {
00062         bool value;
00063         if (v == "true") {
00064                 value = true;
00065         } else if (v == "false") {
00066                 value = false;
00067         } else {
00068                 return 0;
00069         }
00070         MMLbool *b = new MMLbool(value);
00071         return b;
00072 }

00135 Attributes::Attributes() {
00136         // initialize the attributes that can be set from the environment
00137         for (uint i = 0; i<numAttributes; ++i) {
00138                 att[i] = 0;
00139         }
00140         p = 0;
00141         ps = new PainterSettings(this);
00142         save();
00143         ps->setPainter(0);
00144 }
00145 Attributes::~Attributes() {
00146     printf("~Attributes()\n");
00147         setPainter(0);
00148         restore();
00149         assert(changes.empty());
00150         delete ps;
00151 }
00152 void
00153 Attributes::setPainter(MMLPainter *p) {
00154 //      if (p == this->p) return;
00155         // cleanup
00156         if (this->p != 0) {
00157         PainterSettings *tempps = ps;
00158         ps = 0;
00159         restore();
00160         ps = tempps;
00161         }
00162         this->p = p;
00163         ps->setPainter(p);
00164         if (p != 0) {
00165                 // setting of a painter should only occur if there are no saved
00166                 // changes
00167                 assert(changes.size() == 1);
00168         save();
00169                 initDefaults();
00170         }
00171 }
00172 void
00173 Attributes::initDefaults() {
00174         assert(p);
00175         // set ps to 0 so that no MMLPainter 'set' functions are called,
00176         // when changing the attributes
00177         PainterSettings *tempps = ps;
00178         ps = 0;
00179         // set the default values taken from MathML specification
00180         // and environment
00181         setAttribute(CLASS, "");
00182         setAttribute(STYLE, "");
00183         setAttribute(ID, "");
00184         setAttribute(XLINK_HREF, "");
00185         setAttribute(XREF, "");
00186 
00187         // Mathematics style attributes common to token elements
00188         setAttribute(MATHCOLOR, p->mathColor());
00189         setAttribute(MATHBACKGROUND, "transparent");
00190         v_unit ms;
00191         ms.set(p->fontSize(), l_unit::pt);
00192         setAttribute(MATHSIZE, ms);
00193 
00194         // defaults for mo element
00195         setAttribute(FORM, "infix");
00196         setAttribute(MATHVARIANT, "normal");
00197         setAttribute(FENCE, "false");
00198         setAttribute(SEPARATOR, "false");
00199         setAttribute(LSPACE, "thickmathspace");
00200         setAttribute(RSPACE, "thickmathspace");
00201         setAttribute(STRETCHY, "false");
00202         setAttribute(SYMMETRIC, "false");
00203         // set 1000 instead of infinity for now
00204         setAttribute(MAXSIZE, "1000");
00205         setAttribute(MINSIZE, "1");
00206         setAttribute(LARGEOP, false);
00207         setAttribute(MOVABLELIMITS, false);
00208         setAttribute(ACCENT, false);
00209 
00210         // mstyle defaults
00211         setAttribute(SCRIPTLEVEL, 0);
00212         setAttribute(DISPLAYSTYLE, true);
00213         setAttribute(SCRIPTSIZEMULTIPLIER, 0.71f);
00214         setAttribute(SCRIPTMINSIZE, "8pt");
00215         setAttribute(VERYVERYTHINMATHSPACE, "0.0555556em");
00216         setAttribute(VERYTHINMATHSPACE, "0.111111em");
00217         setAttribute(THINMATHSPACE, "0.166667em");
00218         setAttribute(MEDIUMMATHSPACE, "0.222222em");
00219         setAttribute(THICKMATHSPACE, "0.277778em");
00220         setAttribute(VERYTHICKMATHSPACE, "0.333333em");
00221         setAttribute(VERYVERYTHICKMATHSPACE, "0.388889em");
00222 
00223         // mfrac defaults
00224         setAttribute(LINETHICKNESS, "1pt");
00225 
00226         ps = tempps;
00227 }

00239 void
00240 Attributes::setAttributes(const MMLElement *e) {
00241         // save the pointers to the current values in the old array
00242         // shortcut to the list of positions of attributes for this element
00243         const Attribute *attlist = attList[e->id];
00244         // shortcut to the number of attributes of this element
00245         uint len = attListLen[e->id];
00246         for (uint i=0; i<len; ++i) {
00247                 MML::Attribute a = attlist[i];
00248                 e->tmpatt[i] = att[a];
00249                 if (e->att[i]) {
00250                         att[a] = e->att[i];
00251                         if (ps) ps->set(a);
00252                 } else if (e->defatt[e->id][i]) {
00253                         att[a] = e->defatt[e->id][i];
00254                         if (ps) ps->set(a);
00255                 }
00256                 if (!att[a]
00257                         && a != MML::BACKGROUND
00258                         && a != MML::COLOR) {
00259                         cerr << "Attribute " << attributeTag[a]
00260                                 << " has no value for element "
00261                                 << elementTag[e->id] << "." << endl;
00262                         exit(1);
00263                 }
00264         }
00265         save();
00266 }
00267 void
00268 Attributes::unsetAttributes(const MMLElement *e) {
00269         restore();
00270         const Attribute *attlist = attList[e->id];
00271         uint len = attListLen[e->id];
00272         for (uint i=0; i<len; ++i) {
00273                 MML::Attribute a = attlist[i];
00274                 if (e->tmpatt[i] != att[a]) {
00275                         att[a] = e->tmpatt[i];
00276                         if (ps) ps->set(a);
00277                 }
00278         }
00279 }
00280 void
00281 Attributes::setAttribute(MML::Attribute a, const char *c) {
00282         setAttribute(a, DOMString(c));
00283 }
00288 int callcount=0;
00289 void
00290 Attributes::save() {
00291 //    printf("^^^^^^save() %i\n", ++callcount);
00292         cur = new AttributeChanges();
00293         changes.push(cur);
00294 }
00299 void
00300 Attributes::restore() {
00301 //    printf("^^^^^^restore() %i\n", callcount--);
00302         // revert all the changes
00303         while (!cur->empty()) {
00304                 AttributeChange ac = cur->pop();
00305                 if (ac.newA->cleanup) {
00306                         delete ac.newA;
00307                 } else {
00308                         printf("ohoh, you forgot some pointers\n");
00309                 }
00310                 att[ac.id] = ac.oldA;
00311                 if (ps) ps->set(Attribute(ac.id));
00312         }
00313         delete cur;
00314         changes.pop();
00315         if (!changes.empty()) {
00316                 cur = changes.top();
00317         }
00318 }
